item.title: Advent of Code: 2020 Retrospect
item.description: edit 2021-05-15: Yeah, I’m probably not going to finish writing this. Too many things came up; most of the cool things I did are long forgotten; I’ve (kind of?) moved on to new interests. Advent of Code is an annual programming event that spans – you guessed it – the month of December. Challenges are released at midnight for the first 25 days, and programmers race to develop working solutions to solve each problem.

item.title: About
item.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hello! I’m valis, a student learning computer science while dabbling in electrical/mechanical engineering projects. This site exists so that I can share some of my interests and completed work. You can (maybe) expect to see posts on 3d printing Hardware fun Cycling Automation Keyboards Languages For the time being, I’m building this site using Hugo with smol.
